name: Yellow Jackets Alpha v0.2
description:
All feedback is appreciated! Please fill out the feedback form below.

https://forms.gle/ELR21vuk8xFSEWHe9

You can also follow development here: https://twitter.com/_YellowJackets_

Controls

  • LMB - fire weapon
  • Mouse - pitch and yaw
  • Q,E - roll
  • W - boost
  • F - rear view
  • RMB - hover/aim mode
  • P - pause game
  • TAB - Unlock cursor (for shop buttons)
  • fly into items to buy them

In hover mode

  • WASD - strafe
  • Q,E - roll
  • Space, CTRL - vertical movement

Settings - changing sensitivity

  • U,J - Y sensitivity
  • I,K - X sensitivity
  • O,L - Roll sensitivity
